channel.title: Replacing Animations
channel.description:
How would I go about, for instance, replacing my current whip animation to the 377 - 474 (don't matter which, although 459 would be best) animation? My whip's a bit "stiff" when attacking (run is fine) and I think it's looks shit. I opened up the cache and I don't see how I can edit a singular animation...
Thanks for reading.

item.title: Replacing Animations
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
